long_description: Smith's Axe and Machete Sharpener keeps your heavy-duty chopping tools keen-edged for all your wood-cutting and brush-clearing adventures. Put a smooth, sharp edge on both sides of your blade in just minutes with this easy-to-use sharpener's preset carbide surfaces. Cast aluminum head, soft handle, and oversized finger guard help ensure secure grip while sharpening.
short_description: Smith's Axe and Machete Sharpener keeps your heavy-duty chopping tools keen-edged for all your wood-cutting and brush-clearing adventures.
